grade: Jōyō kanji, taught in junior high
on reading compounds: 謹慎【キンシン】self restraint, moderating one's behaviour, penitence, discipline, confinement to one's home, house arrest
謹賀新年【キンガシンネン】Happy New Year
kun reading compounds: 慎む【つつしむ】to be careful, to be discreet, to do in moderation, to refrain (from overdoing), to abstain, to be reverent, to be purified, to be chaste
